Чтож, наконец-то я прошёл игру. Игра - шедевр, этот очень классная игра. Больше всего мне понравилась фраза "Если увидишь Брина то передай ему чтоб пошёл на хрен!". Как только я дошёл до него, я ему это сразу сказал. Игру не сложно проходить. Я проходил игру, пока смотрел видео на телефоне. Потянет игра у любого. У меня intel pentium 2127u(видеокарта встроенная), игра почти всегда была в 120 FPS. Возможно, кому то не понравится что некоторые задания нужно делать на время. В самом конце, когда нужно взрывать ядро Цитадели если вы сразу не начнёте стрелять "энергетическими шарами" то игра не закончится, и вы телепортируйтесь на ваше последнее сохранение/быстрое сохранение.

Серия игр Half-Life 2 при первом моём прохождении в далёком 2010 году на пиратке меня очень сильно впечатлила, одна из самых легендарных  игр которую я просто ОБОЖАЮ. Сколько бы ей не было лет, данная игра зависла у меня в сердце и останется там на веки вечные, не дай бог есть люди, которые всё ещё не знакомы с данной вселенной, я вам настоятельно рекомендую чёрт возьми пройти её!
Я РЕКОМЕНДУЮ данный ШЕДЕВР!!!!!!

---{Para quem esse jogo foi desenvolvido?}---
( ) Crianças.
(X) Todos os públicos.
( ) Adolescentes.
( ) Adultos.
( ) Pessoas que conhecem a morte.

---{Texturas, Gráficos e Lindeza?}---
( ) Desenhado no Paint por macacos sem treino.
( ) 220 x 120p.
( ) Meia boca, tem piores.
(X) Mais ou menos.
( ) Dentro da média atual.
( ) Gráficos lindos e boa iluminação.
( ) Quase um Red Dead Redemption 2.
( ) Isso veio de outra dimensão.

---{Falhas?}---
( ) Isso é uma falha.
( ) Bug pra todo lado, tipo tiro em favela no Rio.
( ) Muita falha mas dá pra jogar.
(x) Poucos bugs.
( ) Bugs que são legais e não atrapalham.
( ) Sem falhas.
( ) Esse jogo saiu perfeito do forno.

---{É difícil?}---
( ) Basta assisitir o jogo.
( ) Requer certo uso do cérebro.

( ) Vai dar rage, bater na mãe e se matar até conseguir ser pro.
( ) Não vai dar não.

---{Tem uma história?}---
( ) Não, um PUBG da vida.
( ) Tem história só pra não dizer que não tem.
( ) Dá pra gostar da história.
(X) Tem um historia para contexto.
( ) Consegue te arrancar uma lágrima ou duas.
( ) Dava pra fazer um livro.
( ) Nível Senhor dos anéis.
( ) Deveria constar no curriculum do Ensino médio.
( ) Melhor que graduação em uma federal.

---{Áudio e músicas?}---
( ) Nível do Funk Brasileiro.
( ) Delete a pasta de Áudio.
( ) Jogue mutado.
(X) Dá pra escutar.
( ) Os caras capricharam no áudio.
( ) Tem um som muito agradável e trilha sonora tranquila.
( ) Baixe a play list pra escutar no ônibus.
( ) Toque o tema no seu casamento.

---{Trambolho necessário pra rodar?}---
( ) Verifique se o Pc roda Paint.
(X) PC da Xuxa.
( ) PC Gamer da Casas Bahia.
( ) Um PC decente.
( ) Um PC já considerado gamer.
( ) Invista no minimo 4k em hardware.
( ) SLI de 2080ti.
( ) Esqueça, a tecnologia atual não dá conta.

En mi opinión , una obra maestra de los FPS , una de las secuelas que en mi opinión , superó en todo aspecto al primero, una excelente banda sonora , unos gráficos revolucionarios para la época , unas mecánicas simples pero muy buenas , y una historia y transfondo de lo mejor que he visto (9,75/10)

Half-Life 2's presentation is extraordinary, thanks to the new Source engine. Even though Half-Life 2 debuted a year later than originally anticipated, it is still very much a cutting-edge game, featuring state-of-the-art graphics technology. While Doom 3 features superior lighting and shadowing, it didn't really succeed at bringing a credible and cohesive world to life. Half-Life 2 does, and the environments in the game are simply stunning, from the plazas and streets of City 17 to the rusted interiors of an abandoned factory. There's also some excellent level design in the game, including a deserted town full of deadly traps and the gaping interiors of an alien citadel. The engine does a great job of rendering both indoor and outdoor environments, and there's a lot of eye candy to absorb if you have the hardware to handle it. Most surfaces nearly glisten with the latest shader effects, and the textures are sharp and richly detailed.

One of the big new features is the incorporation of physics into the engine, and that has an effect on the visuals as well. Basically, everything moves and behaves as it ought to, so when you hammer a strider or a gunship with a rocket, it shudders and recoils from the impact. Characters also move in a lifelike manner, and the animations are smooth and believable. You'll also discover that objects in the environment can be used against you--there's nothing that zombies like more than to hurl a metal barrel in your direction. On the other hand, you can use the gravity gun to hurl objects about, or even to pick things up and use them as a shield.

While Gordon Freeman doesn't say anything, you'll quickly discover that some of the best parts of the game are when a character has a one-sided conversation with you. This also lets Valve showcase its remarkable new facial technology, which brings human characters to life like never before. You can literally see the gleam in characters' eyes when they speak, and they can display a wide range of emotions, from fear to familial pride. It also helps that Valve enlisted notable talent to supply the voices for many characters, including Robert Guillaume, Louis Gossett Jr., Robert Culp, and Michelle Forbes. The voice acting is superb, and the script itself features wit, warmth, and humor.
Amazing sequel to the last game and ragdoll physics are fun in the game.
